Given its value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects its high value while allowing you to enjoy significant savings compared to the market rate. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and help you make the most of this exceptional opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
